name: SubCoots
description:
If your mouse is drifting try changing your browser

P - unlock mouse

WASD - move

Space - dash

Left Click - attack

Right Click - Pick Up / Throw

Game for the Ludwig Game Jam

Programming - https://twitter.com/Lees_Pic

art - https://twitter.com/Fuzzertz
